title: WTB: a few random T cards
author: x2drich2000

posts.post_title: WTB: a few random T cards
posts.post_content:
Morning, have a few random T cards I would like to pick up.  For the most part, condition doesn't matter, so let me know what you have and price.  Thanks

T222 Henry, Alexander, most other "high numbers" (any condition)
T216 Kotton Young (any condition)
T216 Virginia Extra - Any, particularly interested in Davis (any condition)
T227 Cobb (pr-vg)
T206 Johnson Portrait (SC 150 series preferred, but not required), Young Glove, Lajoie Portrait (good/vgish)
T205 Young (good/vgish)

DJ
[url]x2drich2000@yahoo.com[/url]
Where were you in November when I auctioned off a T227 Cobb?  :)
